descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6]This MOD add[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=6]s standalone follower in your world.[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00]※Ａuthor is a Japanese。My English is not good enough.[/color][color=#ffff00]Watashi eigo wakarimasen!

[/color][color=#ff0000][size=6]※Coution[/size][/color]
Be careful when you update it from Ver2.51 to Ver2.52~.
Please keep all [color=#ffff00]J'grantz's[/color] items.
J'grantz went back to Jorrvaskr after the update.[color=#ffff00]
[/color]
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/size]Kanatsushiki no wana mo kowaku naine.
